tag_list: teamlauncher, staff-leasing, staff-placement, remote-staffing, date-com, adknowledge, virtumundo, treeloot-com, shock-the-monkey, seo, sem, ppc-management, affiliate-management, affiliate-marketing, search-engine-marketing, search-engine-optimization, soc
overview: Mr. Rick Ramos is a seasoned veteran in online marketing with over fifteen years experience developing global brands for major industry players. Prior to becoming Chief Marketing Officer of TeamLauncher.com, Mr. Ramos was Vice President of Marketing at Adknowledge, which multiplied its valuation ten times during his tenure there. Mr. Ramos also ran marketing for Date.com and Virtumundo.com, and was instrumental in their success. While at Virtumundo, Mr Ramos was credited with developing the most widely viewed banner for 2000 & 2001 worldwide. Mr. Ramos earned his M.B.A. from the University of Miami.
